holidays.title: Blasphemy Day
holidays.description: Honor your freedom by fighting for the oppressed. Raise your voice against blasphemy laws.

holidays.title: Botswana Independence Day
holidays.description: On this day in 1966, Botswana became an independent state from the United Kingdom.

holidays.title: Extra Virgin Olive Oil Day
holidays.description: Be ready to try as many olive oils as you can on this day!

holidays.title: Fiesta de San Jerónimo
holidays.description: Let us celebrate Fiesta de San Jerónimo, Nicaragua's most splendid cultural and religious celebration.

holidays.title: International Translation Day
holidays.description: The translator’s role is indispensable in maintaining productive, positive, and clear interpersonal communication in international circles.

holidays.title: International Translation Day
holidays.description: Get ready to decipher the extremely fascinating world of translators with us.

holidays.title: NATIONAL CHEWING GUM DAY
holidays.description: The gummy texture, the translucent bubble, the satisfying pop!

holidays.title: National Hot Mulled Cider Day
holidays.description: Put your feet up and get cozy as we celebrate National Hot Mulled Cider Day.

holidays.title: ​National Love People Day
holidays.description: This day is dedicated to inspiring and supporting others with the power of unconditional love.

holidays.title: NATIONAL MUD PACK DAY
holidays.description: Let’s ‘face’ it, National Mud Pack Day is a day worth celebrating!

holidays.title: National Puppy Mill Survivor Day
holidays.description: We are raising awareness about puppy mills and the dangers they represent to canines today.

holidays.title: Orange Shirt Day
holidays.description: Let’s join hands in solidarity as we honor the indigenous children sent to residential schools in Canada.

holidays.title: Pet Tricks Day
holidays.description: Teach your cat, dog, or even your pet snake a cool trick today!

holidays.title: Rumi Day
holidays.description: Get a book with the great works of Rumi and curl up on your couch today!

holidays.title: Thunderbirds Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Thunderbirds Day by tuning in to “Thunderbirds” or “Thunderbirds Are Go!”

holidays.title: Captain Kirk Douglas’s Birthday
holidays.description: Captain Kirk Douglas from The Roots is a talented guitarist and audience favorite.

holidays.title: Elie Wiesel’s Birthday
holidays.description: Celebrate the holocaust survivor who used his horrific experience to better humanity.

holidays.title: Fran Drescher’s Birthday
holidays.description: Fran Drescher is a film icon who knows a thing or two about success!

holidays.title: Johnny Mathis’s Birthday
holidays.description: This musical icon has been making beautiful music since he was a kid.

holidays.title: Maddie Ziegler’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young, spirited, celebrated dancer knows how to fly like a bird!

holidays.title: Max Verstappen’s Birthday
holidays.description: The stakes for the next generation's top speed champion are quite high.

holidays.title: Raveena Aurora’s Birthday
holidays.description: The world is eager to watch this talented singer who has shown so much potential.

holidays.title: Rylo Rodriguez’s Birthday
holidays.description: Rylo has achieved success, but he still acts as a voice for the youth.

holidays.title: T-Pain’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Grammy-winning musical artist has always known how to be a high achiever.

holidays.title: Trevi Moran’s Birthday
holidays.description: With determination, talent, and acceptance, this YouTube sensation is heading for unstoppable success.

holidays.title: Whitney Rose’s Birthday
holidays.description: Here’s everything you need to know about Whitney Rose, her family, her business, and her children.
